entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
